Face mask detection

02 Mar 2021 - navasai

Face Mask Detection in Real Time by Using Open CV and CNN

Total of 1376 images having two classified images i.e. with mask and without mask is trained using Open CV and Harr Cascade along with deep learning - CNN model. Achieved 95% of accuracy on testing dataset. Model helps to identify the persons without mask and helps to stop the spread of virus.
